name: Ext_R2_Timing_re_frequencyMax
title: Cross-version Extension for R2.Timing.repeat.frequencyMax for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version extension represents Timing.repeat.frequencyMax from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Timing|1.0.2 for use in FHIR R4.

element.short: Event occurs up to frequencyMax times per period
element.definition: If present, indicates that the frequency is a range - so repeat between [frequency] and [frequencyMax] times within the period or period range.
element.comment: `Timing.repeat.frequencyMax` maps to R4 `Timing.repeat.frequencyMax`.  So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
